languages.text: Падение кабала Опустошительной бури на несколько кровавых мгновений сплотило Комморру. Элиты Темного города, отложив вражду, обрели новую забаву в разграблении владений архонта Иремерисс. Судьба Опустошительной бури напомнила иным кабалам — ничто в Темном городе не вечно, кроме него самого.

The fall of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest united Commorragh for a brief and bloody moment. The elites of the Dark City set their squabbles aside and found a new game in tearing apart the domain of Archon Yremeryss. The fate of the Reaving Tempest reminded the other Kabals that nothing lasts forever in the Dark City, save the city itself.
languages.original_text: Падение кабала Опустошительной бури на несколько кровавых мгновений сплотило Комморру. Элиты Темного города, отложив вражду, обрели новую забаву в разграблении владений архонта Иремерисс. Судьба Опустошительной бури напомнила иным кабалам — ничто в Темном городе не вечно, кроме него самого.

traits.locale_text: The fall of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest for a brief, bloody moment untied Commorragh. The elites of the Dark City put their squabbles aside and found a new game in tearing apart the domain of the Archon Yremeriss. The fate of the Reaving Tempest reminded other Kabals — no thing is permanent in the Dark City but for the City itself.

The fall of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest for a brief, bloody moment untied Commorragh. The elites of the Dark City put their squabbles aside and found a new game in tearing apart the domain of the Archon Yremeriss. The fate of the Reaving Tempest reminded other Kabals — no thing is permanent in the Dark City but for the City itself.

The fall of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest unravelled Commorragh for a brief and bloody moment. The elites of the Dark City put their squabbles aside and found a new game in tearing apart the domain of Archon Yremeryss. The fate of the Reaving Tempest reminded other Kabals — nothing is permanent in the Dark City but the city itself.

The fall of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest unravelled Commorragh for a brief and bloody moment. The elites of the Dark City put their squabbles aside and found a new game in tearing apart the domain of Archon Yremeryss. The fate of the Reaving Tempest reminded other Kabals — nothing is permanent in the Dark City but the city itself.

The fall of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest united Commorragh for a brief and bloody moment. The elites of the Dark City set their squabbles aside and found a new game in tearing apart the domain of Archon Yremeryss. The fate of the Reaving Tempest reminded the other Kabals that nothing lasts forever in the Dark City, save the city itself.

The fall of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest united Commorragh for a brief and bloody moment. The elites of the Dark City set their squabbles aside and found a new game in tearing apart the domain of Archon Yremeryss. The fate of the Reaving Tempest reminded the other Kabals that nothing lasts forever in the Dark City, save the city itself.

languages.text: 狂风阴谋团的陨落让科摩罗得到了短暂而血腥的和平。黑暗之城的精英们暂且搁置了他们之间的纷争，争相瓜分伊芮梅莉斯执政官的领土，以此为乐。对其他阴谋团而言，狂风阴谋团的下场是个警示——在黑暗之城，除了这座城市本身之外，没有什么是永恒的。
languages.original_text: The fall of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest united Commorragh for a brief and bloody moment. The elites of the Dark City set their squabbles aside and found a new game in tearing apart the domain of Archon Yremeryss. The fate of the Reaving Tempest reminded the other Kabals that nothing lasts forever in the Dark City, save the city itself.

traits.locale_text: 狂风阴谋团的陨落让科摩罗暂时陷入了血腥的动乱。黑暗之城的精英们暂且搁置了他们之间的纷争，争相瓜分伊芮梅莉斯执政官的领土，以此为乐。对其他阴谋团而言，狂风阴谋团的下场是个警示——在黑暗之城，除了这座城市本身之外，没有什么是永恒的。

languages.text: Der Sturz der Kabale des plündernden Sturms einte Commorragh für einen kurzen, blutigen Moment. Die Eliten der Dunklen Stadt legten ihren ständigen Streit bei und fanden neues Vergnügen darin, das Reich der Archontin Yremeryss zu zerrupfen. Das Schicksal des plündernden Sturms erinnerte die anderen Kabalen daran: In der Dunklen Stadt ist nichts von Dauer außer der Stadt selbst.
languages.original_text: The fall of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest united Commorragh for a brief and bloody moment. The elites of the Dark City set their squabbles aside and found a new game in tearing apart the domain of Archon Yremeryss. The fate of the Reaving Tempest reminded the other Kabals that nothing lasts forever in the Dark City, save the city itself.

traits.locale_text: Der Sturz der Kabale des plündernden Sturms brachte Commorragh für einen kurzen, blutigen Moment aus dem Gleichgewicht. Die Eliten der Dunklen Stadt legten ihren ständigen Streit bei und fanden neues Vergnügen darin, das Reich der Archontin Yremeryss zu zerrupfen. Das Schicksal des plündernden Sturms erinnerte die anderen Kabalen daran: In der Dunklen Stadt ist nichts von Dauer außer der Stadt selbst.

languages.text: La chute de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse unit Commorragh pendant un instant aussi bref que brutal. L'élite de la Cité Crépusculaire mit ses querelles de côté pour se consacrer à son nouveau passe-temps : la destruction du domaine de l'archonte Yremeryss. Le sort de la Tempête ravageuse rappela aux autres Kabales que rien n'était éternel à Commorragh, sauf la Cité Crépusculaire elle-même.
languages.original_text: The fall of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest united Commorragh for a brief and bloody moment. The elites of the Dark City set their squabbles aside and found a new game in tearing apart the domain of Archon Yremeryss. The fate of the Reaving Tempest reminded the other Kabals that nothing lasts forever in the Dark City, save the city itself.

traits.locale_text: La chute de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse secoua Commorragh pendant un instant aussi bref que brutal. L’élite de la Cité Crépusculaire mit ses querelles de côté pour se consacrer à son nouveau passe-temps : la destruction du domaine de l'archonte Yremeryss. Le sort de la Tempête ravageuse rappela aux autres Kabales que rien n'était éternel à Commorragh, sauf la Cité Crépusculaire elle-même.

languages.text: La caída de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora unió a Commorragh por un momento tan efímero como brutal. Las élites de la Ciudad Siniestra dejaron sus intrigas de lado para divertirse desgarrando los dominios de la Arconte Yremeryss. El final de la Tempestad Asoladora recordó a las demás kábalas que lo único eterno en Commorragh es la existencia de la propia ciudad.
languages.original_text: The fall of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest united Commorragh for a brief and bloody moment. The elites of the Dark City set their squabbles aside and found a new game in tearing apart the domain of Archon Yremeryss. The fate of the Reaving Tempest reminded the other Kabals that nothing lasts forever in the Dark City, save the city itself.

traits.locale_text: La caída de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora desató el caos en Commorragh por un momento tan efímero como brutal. Las élites de la Ciudad Siniestra dejaron sus intrigas de lado para divertirse desgarrando los dominios de la Arconte Yremeryss. El final de la Tempestad Asoladora recordó a las demás kábalas que lo único permanente en Commorragh es la existencia de la propia ciudad.

languages.text: 陰謀団〈略奪の嵐〉の崩壊は、コモラフを束の間、血なまぐさい状態で統一した。仄暗き都のエリートたちは抗争を一旦控え、アーコン・イレメリスの領地を解体するという新たなゲームを見出した。〈略奪の嵐〉の運命は、他の陰謀団にある事を思い出させた。それは仄暗き都において、仄暗き都以外に永遠に続くものは何もないということだ。
languages.original_text: The fall of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest united Commorragh for a brief and bloody moment. The elites of the Dark City set their squabbles aside and found a new game in tearing apart the domain of Archon Yremeryss. The fate of the Reaving Tempest reminded the other Kabals that nothing lasts forever in the Dark City, save the city itself.

traits.locale_text: 陰謀団〈略奪の嵐〉の崩壊は、コモラフを束の間、血なまぐさい状態で統一した。仄暗き都のエリートたちは抗争を一旦控え、アーコン・イレメリスの領地を解体するという新たなゲームを見出した。〈略奪の嵐〉の運命は、他の陰謀団にある事を思い出させた。それは仄暗き都において、仄暗き都以外に永遠に続くものは何もないということだ。

languages.text: Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'nın düşüşü, Commorragh'ı kısa ve kanlı bir anlığına tek yumruk yaptı. Kara Şehir'in elitleri, anlaşmazlıklarını bir kenara bıraktı ve Arkon Yremeryss'in diyarını paramparça edip oradan beslenmeye odaklandı. Müfteris Kasırga'nın kaderi, Kara Şehir'in kendisi hariç burada her şeyin bir sonu olduğunu diğer Kaballara tekrar hatırlattı.
languages.original_text: The fall of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest united Commorragh for a brief and bloody moment. The elites of the Dark City set their squabbles aside and found a new game in tearing apart the domain of Archon Yremeryss. The fate of the Reaving Tempest reminded the other Kabals that nothing lasts forever in the Dark City, save the city itself.

traits.locale_text: Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'nın düşüşü, Commorragh'ı kısa ve kanlı bir anlığına tek yumruk yaptı. Kara Şehir'in elitleri anlaşmazlıklarını bir kenara bıraktı ve Arkon Yremeryss'in diyarını paramparça edip oradan beslenmeye odaklandılar. Müfteris Kasırga'nın kaderi, diğer Kaballar için, Kara Şehir'de hiçbir şeyin sonsuza dek var olamayacağının bir hatırlatıcısı oldu. Şehrin kendisi hariç.
